cross_panel_issues.detail: Panels 01, 03, 05, 06 are B&W pencil sketches; Panels 02, 04, 07, 08, 09 are full-color 3D Pixar renders. Director decision needed on target style.
Most 3D panels are square (1:1). Only Panel 07 appears 16:9. All should be 16:9 per spec.

issues.detail: B&W sketch while other panels are 3D renders

scene-01-panel-01.notes: Wide establishing shot - character detail minimal at this distance, acceptable

issues.detail: 3D render while spec calls for B&W sketch
Mia should be at edge of frame per spec

scene-01-panel-02.notes: Leo character match is excellent. Previous audit (Feb 7) incorrectly reported dark hair - likely panel was regenerated since then.

Nina.action: CORRECT - putting on earrings, carrying purse
Nina.hair_texture: MINOR CONCERN - appears straighter than approved wavy look

issues.detail: Hair waviness not prominent enough in sketch

scene-01-panel-03.notes: Tracking shot silhouette reads correctly. Minor hair concern acceptable for sketch style.

issues.expected: stocky, soft around middle, round face
issues.detail: Gabe looks like a completely different character
Glasses need to be more visible as Gabe's most recognizable feature
Background kids both appear dark-haired; Leo should be visibly blonde

scene-01-panel-04.notes: First clear two-shot of parents. Gabe must match his stocky turnaround design. Wardrobe is correct here.

scene-01-panel-06.notes: Object shot (TV with static/foreshadowing) - no characters to audit

Leo.clothing: CORRECT - green dinosaur pajamas with pattern

Nina_background.wardrobe: WRONG - appears in casual clothes (pink/burgundy top), not black cocktail dress

Gabe_background.wardrobe: WRONG - appears in casual clothes, not tuxedo

issues.detail: Wrong outfit for Scene 1 date night preparation
Wrong outfit for Scene 1 date night preparation
Jenny not visible in the scene

scene-01-panel-07.notes: Kids in foreground are excellent. Parents' wardrobe in background is wrong but they're out of focus. Composition reads well as OTS shot. Aspect ratio appears correct (16:9).

Mia.hair_style: MINOR ISSUE - loose/messy, not clearly in high ponytail

issues.detail: Ponytail is Mia's distinctive feature from turnaround

scene-01-panel-08.notes: Strong character match overall. The 'Promise?' moment reads emotionally. Previous audit (Feb 7) incorrectly reported light hair and light skin - panel clearly regenerated since then.

Gabe.face: IMPROVED - rounder than Panel 04, closer to turnaround
Gabe.build: MINOR - slightly leaner than turnaround but much better than Panel 04
Gabe.wardrobe: CRITICAL ERROR - wearing casual plaid flannel shirt, NOT tuxedo
Gabe.overall: Facial features improved but wardrobe completely wrong

Nina.expression: CORRECT - stern 'don't you dare' look, arms crossed
Nina.wardrobe: CRITICAL ERROR - wearing casual burgundy sweater, NOT black cocktail dress
Nina.overall: Expression perfect but wardrobe completely wrong

issues.actual: casual green plaid flannel shirt (turnaround casual outfit)
issues.detail: Scene 1 specifies black-tie attire. This is the wrong outfit entirely.
Scene 1 specifies elegant black dress. This is the wrong outfit entirely.

scene-01-panel-09.notes: Climactic beat of Scene 1. Character faces and expressions are actually good. The critical issue is WARDROBE - both parents are in casual clothes instead of their date night attire. Previous audit missed this entirely.

regen_queue.reason: Both parents in wrong wardrobe (casual instead of black-tie). Climactic scene beat.
Gabe too tall/lean/angular. Must match stocky turnaround design.
Parents' wardrobe wrong in background. Kids are excellent. Could be acceptable if background is deemed too blurry to matter.
Mia's ponytail not clearly defined. Otherwise strong character match.

corrections_from_previous_audit.panel_02: Previous audit reported Leo with dark hair (CRITICAL). Current panel shows BLONDE hair matching turnaround. Panel appears regenerated.
corrections_from_previous_audit.panel_07: Previous audit reported busy composition and unclear hair distinction. Current panel has clean OTS composition with clearly distinguished kids' hair. But wardrobe issue was missed.
corrections_from_previous_audit.panel_08: Previous audit reported light hair, straight texture, and light skin (CRITICAL). Current panel shows dark curly hair and correct skin tone. Panel appears regenerated.
corrections_from_previous_audit.panel_09: Previous audit reported 3 figures and angular Gabe. Current panel shows 2 figures (correct) and improved Gabe face. But WARDROBE ERROR (most critical issue) was not flagged.

director_decisions_needed: Standardize panel style: all B&W sketch or all 3D Pixar render?
Is Panel 07 background wardrobe issue critical enough to regenerate, given parents are blurred?
Is Panel 08 acceptable as-is, or does Mia's ponytail need to be more defined?
